attributes.action: Stop the increases in London Public Transport Fares
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Olympics has sent London Public Transport Fares spiralling out of control.  It now costs £2 for a single bus journey and still many day travelcards remained over £5 each.  Congestion ensures you can't get anywhere at busy times and there's never a seat so we shouldn't pay so much.  One fare increase = fair enough, but don't keep doing it!!! It's becoming extortionate!!! Plus oysters cannot be used on some national rail services!!! ALL LONDONERS, SIGN THE PETITION!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
